item.description:
Hi folks! Hope you can join us in getting some exercise in the company of friends.

WHEN AND WHERE: This Meetup will take place at Sleeping Giant, which is a Connecticut State Park located in Hamden. Meet at the big trail map at the Park entrance, which is located on Mt. Carmel Avenue, between 5:25 and 5:30, and we will begin walking at 5:35.

COST: Please contribute one dollar towards the monthly fee that is charged by the Meetup Website.

DIRECTIONS: Please see Sleeping Giant State Park Website.
PARKING NOTE: Please take advantage of the free street parking on Carmel Avenue, adjacent to park, ACROSS FROM (not inside) Quinnipiac University.

Trail maps are usually available at the park entrance, if you want to get to know the park.
item.how_to_find_us: Sarah (Group Organizer) will be wearing red.

group.name: New Haven Walks in the Woods

item.name: Evening Walk at Sleeping Giant
